caption.title: Distribution of chikungunya cases and Aedes infestation index in Panama and San Miguelito districts from 2014 and 2015.
caption.p: Maps with imported (blue dots) and autochthonous (red dots) Chikungunya confirmed cases showing the Aedes infestation index for each county of Panama and San Miguelito districts (green = low infestation index, < 2; yellow = medium infestation index, 2â€“4; orange = high infestation index, >4) from May (epidemiological week 19) to December 2014 ( A) and January to July (epidemiological week 26) 2015 ( B).
